item.title: Domyos VM 460
item.description: My host mom in France got this bike used and the spedometer never worked. Symptoms: When the pedals were rotating, the speed and distance readings stayed at 0.

item.title: Stakol Ice Maker EP22769
item.description: Persistence was key on this one. Symptoms: Machine turned on, but didn’t operate. Diagnosis: I had to take this one almost completely apart before finding one red wire coming from the control board that had severed.

item.title: GE Profile Spacemaker II Sensor
item.description: I found this GE Profile Spacemaker II Sensor microwave near a dumpster and it needed some TLC. Diagnosis: Coupler between the motor and turntable was broken.

item.title: Capresso 4-Cup Espresso & Cappuccino Maker
item.description: This Capresso 303 required creativity. Someone brought this into the Tucson Repair Cafe. Symptoms: It wasn’t making coffee, and the coffee/steam selector knob was broken. Diagnosis:

item.title: Thomas TPC-101 Radio
item.description: No power? . . . A dirty potentiometer? Symptoms: The radio wasn’t turning on. Diagnosis: The client and I both measured for continuity at the outlet of the volume knob and got no reading.

item.title: Singer Sewing Machine 7442
item.description: Found this gem at the Family Bargain Thrift Shop on Grant & 7th. Symptoms: The foot control pedal would only depress with a lot of force, preventing any real speed control.

item.title: Bathroom Exhaust Fan
item.description: This fan didn’t even turn it was so filthy. Symptoms: The fan would creak a bit and not really turn at all. Diagnosis: I pulled the cover off and discovered years of collected dust.

item.title: 5-Disc CD Changer
item.description: This 5-disc CD changer required some finesse. Symptoms: When a disc was inserted, the disc would just spin endlessly, and never play anything. Diagnosis: I had to open the device completely, and remove the CD tray, which proved tricky.

item.title: 1938 Singer Sewing Machine Model 201
item.description: What a find this was! Symptoms: My client found this in an alley downtown. The speed control was not working well. The bobin winder barely turned.

item.title: Polder Digital Scale
item.description: This was a case of grimy battery contacts. Symptoms: This digital kitchen scale just wouldn’t turn on. Diagnosis: I instructed the owner to clean the battery contacts, even though they looked pretty clean.

item.title: KitchenAid Mixer
item.description: All it takes is some grime on the contacts. Symptoms: The mixer was either not turning on at all, or turning on for a split second every time the speed was changed.
